Learning Resource Updates

Below are recent documentation and Brightcove Academy course updates.

Index of all documentation updates

Product Release Notes

If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates document.

23-June-2023

Major updates

  • Title: Brightcove Interactivity Documentation

  • Link: https://interactivity.support.brightcove.com/index.html
  • Product: Brightcove Interactivity
  • Product Area:

16-June-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Videos in Folder Report
  • Description: This sample uses the CMS API to generate a report on all the videos a specified folder. The report is shown in JSON and also generated in CSV format. It fetches the video data in batches of 100, so if there is an API timeout or some other error, you will still have some of the data.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/code-samples/cms-api-sample-videos-in-folder-report.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Platform APIs

Major updates

  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Live API

  • Product Area: Live jobs
